metadata.name: Transmutation of Self
metadata.description:
Combining art forms and perspectives, Emonee and Laurel have created a work that launches traditional fashion techniques into the digital world like never before.

Laurel is an abstract artist whose canvas is the face and human body. She is know for her deeply artistic and fully transformative makeup in the fashion industry as seen recently on Doja Cat for NY and Paris fashion week. 

Emonee is a motion graphics artist and director predominantly working on music visuals for artists like Meg the Stallion, Lil Nas X, Kanye West and more. 

In this work Laurel's arms, head and torso were scanned and then digitally layered with custom makeup designs 2D animated by digital visionary, Emonee.
